titles.title: Supporting the goals and ideals of National Health Center Week in order to raise awareness of health services provided by community, migrant, public housing, and homeless health centers, and for other purposes.

Supporting the goals and ideals of National Health Center Week in order to raise awareness of health services provided by community, migrant, public housing, and homeless health centers, and for other purposes.

action.text: Referred to the House Committee on Oversight and Government Reform.

bill.summary: Expresses support for the goals and ideals of National Health Center Week.
